description: This file defines a Spring Boot REST controller for managing job descriptions via CRUD endpoints, including creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting job descriptions specific to the authenticated user.

classes.name: JobController
classes.description: A REST controller for handling job description CRUD operations, enforcing user authentication and authorization.

methods.name: createFromText
methods.description: Creates a new job description from raw text submitted via POST request.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of jobs associated with the current authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific job by ID, verifying user permissions.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a specific job by ID, verifying user permissions.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Updates the full text of a job description identified by ID, verifying user permissions.
